thread.title: Dense fog brings visibility to zero, Delhi freezes at 7°C
thread.title_full: Dense fog brings visibility to zero, Delhi freezes at 7°C

author: DH Web Desk
title: Dense fog brings visibility to zero, Delhi freezes at 7°C
text:
DH Web Desk
Traffic snarl on the Delhi-Gurugram expressway amid low visibility on a foggy winter morning in Delhi-NCR.
Credit: PTI
A boy wrapped in a quilt sits on a cot at a parking area on a cold winter morning in the old quarters of Delhi.
Credit: Reuters
People watch rehearsals for the upcoming Republic Day parade amid foggy conditions on a cold winter morning in New Delhi.
Credit: PTI
A girl gets her picture clicked on the banks of the Yamuna River on a foggy winter morning in New Delhi.
Credit: Reuters
Vehicles ply on the road amid low visibility on a foggy winter morning in Delhi-NCR.
Credit: PTI
A man wrapped in a blanket sells shawls along a roadside on a cold winter morning in New Delhi.
Credit: Reuters
People ride a boat across the Yamuna River on a foggy winter morning in New Delhi.
Credit: Reuters
A thick layer of fog engulfs the Barapullah Flyover in New Delhi.
Credit: PTI
A man sits near a bonfire to warm himself during a cold winter morning in New Delhi.
Credit: PTI
